select menuno, categoryno, menuname from menu where categoryno = #{categoryNo} order by menuname desc

select m.menuno, m.categoryno, m.menuname, m.menudesc, m.menuprice, m.menuimg, m.isspecial, m.ischange, m.unitno, m.discount, u.menuno as usemenu from menu m left outer join usemenu u on m.menuno = u.setno where m.menuno = #{menuNo}
select m.menuno as menu_no, m.categoryno as cate_no from menu m,(select setno from usemenu where menuNo = #{menuNo}) u where m.menuno = u.setno
